backend/main.mo: Defines the ERP backend actor with authorization, storage mixins, and comprehensive data types for orgs, CRM, HR, ecommerce, and operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a DeploymentReadinessBanner update to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing frontend components, hooks, pages, and styles.
frontend/ACTIVITY_2_DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST: Documentation for Activity 2 deployment steps with statuses, verification criteria, and migration notes.
frontend/ACTIVITY_3_OPTION_1_SPEC_TEMPLA: Template for capturing requirements for Activity 3 Option 1 including goals, roles, UI, and backend needs.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/POST_MIGRATION_BUILD_NOTES.md: Developer notes outlining verification steps for the post‑migration build process.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routing, providers, readiness banner, modals, and page layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryMa: CRUD interface for managing categories with a dialog form and table listing.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Shows all orders in a table and allows updating order status with colored badges.
frontend/src/components/admin/Organizati: Lists organizations and provides a dialog to create new ones with form validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Manages products with create/edit dialogs, category selection, and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/crm/ContactManag: CRUD management for contacts, including identity-linked creation and a table view.
frontend/src/components/crm/LeadManageme: UI for viewing, creating, editing, and deleting CRM leads with stage tracking and form dialogs.
frontend/src/components/crm/OpportunityM: Manages opportunities including creation, editing, deletion, and stage/probability handling via form dialogs.
frontend/src/components/crm/PipelineOver: Displays pipeline metrics and lead distribution across stages with summary statistics.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentReadin: Displays an admin-only readiness banner showing deployment steps, statuses, and recommendations based on access control and Stripe setup.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, copyright, and a GitHub link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the main navigation bar with authentication controls, admin links, cart access, and organization switching.
frontend/src/components/hrms/AttendanceM: Placeholder component showing upcoming attendance tracking features.
frontend/src/components/hrms/DepartmentM: CRUD interface for departments with a form dialog and table listing.
frontend/src/components/hrms/EmployeeMan: CRUD management of employees including department assignment, salary, and status handling.
frontend/src/components/hrms/LeaveManage: UI for reviewing pending leave requests, allowing approval or rejection via query hooks with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/hrms/PayrollMana: Placeholder payroll management card displaying a coming-soon message.
frontend/src/components/hrms/Performance: Placeholder performance management card showing a coming-soon message.
frontend/src/components/OrganizationSwit: Dropdown component for selecting and switching between available organizations.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their profile information.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin-only modal for configuring Stripe by submitting a secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/components/WalletManagement: Interface for viewing, adding, and deleting wallets for the selected organization, with dialogs and live updates.
frontend/src/components/WalletSummary.ts: Displays organization wallet balances and recent transactions with auto-refresh, loading states, and error handling.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: Provides a cart context supporting item storage, quantity updates, localStorage persistence, and totals calculation.
frontend/src/contexts/OrganizationContex: Manages the active organization with localStorage persistence, validation against fetched orgs, and query invalidation on changes.
frontend/src/contexts/WalletConnectorCon: Handles wallet connector selection, availability checks, and connect/disconnect logic with state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context with login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking using AuthClient.
Custom hook for localStorage-backed state with JSON serialization and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for backend interactions, including a deployment readiness check with access control and Stripe configuration status.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletConnector.ts: Re-exports the wallet connector hook from its context.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/Activity3Requirements: UI for drafting and storing Activity 3 requirement specs, with clipboard and markdown export features.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard showing analytics, deployment readiness, and management components with access control checks.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page handling quantity updates, ICP or Stripe payment flows, and wallet connections.
frontend/src/pages/CrmDashboard.tsx: CRM dashboard for admins showing CRM stats and management tools with access control.
frontend/src/pages/HrmsDashboard.tsx: Admin-only HR dashboard providing overview metrics and tabbed management for employees, departments, attendance, leaves, payroll, performance, and wallets.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Displays a user’s order history with status badges, details, cancellation handling, and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment failure message with options to return to the cart or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Clears the cart after successful payment and offers navigation to orders or the storefront.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Product catalog with search, category filtering, product cards, loading states, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/pages/WalletOverviewPage.ts: Shows organization wallet summaries with totals, loading/error states, and prompts when no organization is selected.
frontend/src/types/erp-types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for products, orders, CRM, HR, and ERP-related entities mirroring backend structures.
frontend/src/utils/activity3BuildInstruc: Builds markdown instructions from an Activity 3 spec and checks if the spec is empty.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentChecklistSt: Generates deployment step messaging based on access control and Stripe readiness.
frontend/src/utils/formatIdentity.ts: Formats identity strings by truncating their middle section.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/src/utils/walletErrors.ts: Maps backend wallet-related errors to standardized user-facing messages.
frontend/src/wallets/connectors/oisyConn: Implements a wallet connector for Oisy, handling availability, connection, and state checks.
frontend/src/wallets/connectors/plugConn: Implements a wallet connector for Plug, supporting connect, disconnect, and identity retrieval.
frontend/src/wallets/inpageProviders.d.t: Defines TypeScript types for in-page wallet provider objects for Plug and Oisy.
frontend/src/wallets/walletConnectorRegi: Registers available wallet connectors and provides lookup functions.
frontend/src/wallets/walletConnectorType: Defines wallet connector interfaces, types, and connection state structures.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended theme settings, plugins, and custom animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, existing features, metadata, and configuration flags.
